description: MainActivity for an Android app, setting up the app theme and primary view components, including a notes application with ViewModel integration.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity that initializes the app and sets up the root composable view.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Overrides the Activity.onCreate method to set the content view of the app to the composable function NotesAppRoot.

methods.name: NotesAppRoot
methods.description: A @Composable function that applies the app's MaterialTheme and initializes the view model and main app UI.
